// This file is auto-generated. Do not edit manually.
// Structure: HashTableCompact
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdint>
#include <limits>
#include <string_view>

class HashTableCompactStructure_Single_5 final {
    struct e {
        float key;
        uint64_t hash_code;
        
        e(const float key, const uint64_t hash_code)
           : key(key), hash_code(hash_code) {}
    };

    static constexpr std::array<uint8_t, 5> bucket_starts = {
        0, 1, 2, 3, 3
     };

    static constexpr std::array<uint8_t, 5> bucket_counts = {
        1, 1, 1, 0, 2
     };

    inline static const std::array<e, 5> entries = {
        e(0.0f, 0), e(1.0f, 1065353216), e(std::numeric_limits<float>::lowest(), 4286578687), e(-1.0f, 3212836864), e(std::numeric_limits<float>::max(), 2139095039)
    };

    static uint64_t get_hash(const float value) noexcept
    {
        uint32_t bits;
        std::memcpy(&bits, &value, sizeof(bits));
        if (((bits - 1) & ~0x80000000u) >= 0x7F800000u)
            bits &= 0x7F800000u;
        return bits;
    }

public:
    [[nodiscard]]
    static constexpr bool contains(const float key) noexcept {
        if (key < std::numeric_limits<float>::lowest() || key > std::numeric_limits<float>::max())
            return false;


        const uint64_t hash = get_hash(key);
        const size_t index = hash % 5;
        const size_t start = static_cast<size_t>(bucket_starts[index]);
        const size_t count = static_cast<size_t>(bucket_counts[index]);
        const size_t end = start + count;

        for (size_t i = start; i < end; i++) {
            const auto& entry = entries[i];

            if (entry.hash_code == hash && entry.key == key)
                return true;
        }

        return false;
    }

    static constexpr size_t item_count = 5;
    static constexpr float min_key = std::numeric_limits<float>::lowest();
    static constexpr float max_key = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
};
